autoDeployment.autoModeDesc: When enabled, all deployment steps run automatically

auth.title: Cloudflare Account Authentication
auth.description: Please ensure you are logged in to Cloudflare and have permission to create Workers and KV namespaces.

config.title: Configure Project Parameters
config.apiKeyPlaceholder: Please enter your database access key

kvCreate.title: Create KV Namespace
kvCreate.descriptionPrefix: The system will create a KV namespace named

kvBind.title: Bind KV Namespace
kvBind.description: Bind the created KV namespace to the Worker so it can access data storage.

deploy.title: Deploy Worker
deploy.description: Build and deploy the project to Cloudflare Workers.

test.title: Testing
test.description: Verify deployment results and ensure all functions work properly.

done.title: ðŸŽ‰ Deployment Complete!
done.desc: Your JSON Base service has been successfully deployed to Cloudflare Workers.

console.apiTestDescription: Use create and query functions in Data Management to test the API.
console.quickApiSample:
Create data:
POST /data/example
Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY
{"name": "example", "value": "data"}

Get data:
GET /data/example
Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY
-> {"name": "example", "value": "data"}

delete.confirmHint: This action cannot be undone. Data will be permanently removed.
delete.confirmText: Are you sure you want to delete "{{id}}"?
delete.failed: An error occurred while deleting data

deploymentGuide.title: ðŸš€ Deployment Guide
deploymentGuide.subtitle: Follow the steps below to quickly deploy your JSON Base service

notifications.configSaved: Configuration saved, please continue to the next step
notifications.deployComplete: Deployment complete! WebUI console is ready

step1.title: Step 1: Configure API Key
step1.apiKeyPlaceholder: Please enter your database access key

step2.title: Step 2: Bind KV Namespace
step2.navigateKv: Navigate to Workers and Pages -> KV -> Create namespace
step2.addBinding: Add a KV binding in Workers and Pages -> worker-json-base -> Settings -> Variables
step2.kvSelect: KV namespace: select the namespace you created

step3.title: Step 3: Deploy Worker
step3.firstDeployLogin: You need to log in to your Cloudflare account for the first deployment

step4.title: Step 4: Test Features
